score.explanation: Your Wi-Fi performance is decent for most activities, but congestion could affect streaming or gaming stability. Monitor for interference from neighboring networks.
score.trend_summary: Download and upload speeds have improved, but ping has worsened slightly.

performance.interpretation: Supports HD streaming and moderate gaming. Ideal for multiple users on video calls or backups.

problems: High network congestion, with 12 networks detected, increasing potential interference.
5GHz channels are crowded, which may reduce throughput.
Signal strength varies, particularly on the 2.4GHz band.
fixes: Switch the 2.4GHz channel to 6 to reduce interference.
Change the 5GHz channel to 149 for less congestion.
Enable Smart Connect for automatic band steering.
Consider relocating the router to the center of your home.
Upgrade to a tri-band router if congestion persists.
router_steps: Log into your router at the appropriate URL.
Navigate to the Wi-Fi settings section.
questions: Is your router placed near other electronic devices?
